name: Three to the End
description:
Use the ARROW KEYS (or WASD) to control three blocks simultaneously and guide them all to the goal square in platformer-style gameplay.

Press SPACEBAR to start the game.

Tips:

  • There is a double-jump move available.
  • The levels are randomly generated and sometimes end up in configurations that are impossible to win. If that happens, you can use the SPACEBAR to reset with a new level.
  • Every time a new level is generated (either by winning or manually resetting), the blocks move faster and are harder to control.
  • If keyboard input is not working, try clicking inside the play area to return active focus to the game.

Made for Low Effort Jam 22 (theme: "Three") as an excuse to try out the Kaboom.js game engine. Thanks for playing!
